languages.text: "В разуме каждой единицы Амарната спали общие знания. Ты ведь пытался дешифровать нейрокогитаторы других Ханейманнов, но безуспешно, не так ли? Ты сам создал этот шифр, заперший память Амарната".

"Shared knowledge lay dormant inside the mind of every Amarnat unit. You tried to decrypt the other Haneumanns' neurocogitators, did you not? But to no avail. It was you who created the cipher that locked Amarnat's memory."
languages.original_text: "В разуме каждой единицы Амарната спали общие знания. Ты ведь пытался дешифровать нейрокогитаторы других Ханейманнов, но безуспешно, не так ли? Ты сам создал этот шифр, заперший память Амарната".

traits.locale_text: "Shared knowledge lay dormant inside the mind of every Amarnat unit. You tried to decrypt the other Haneumanns' neurocogitators, did you not? But to no avail. It was you who created the cypher that locked Amarnat's memory."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

traits.locale_text: "Shared knowledge lay dormant inside the mind of every Amarnat unit. You tried to decrypt the other Haneumanns' neurocogitators, did you not? But to no avail. It was you who created the cipher that locked Amarnat's memory."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: 「共有した知識は各アマルナト・ユニットの精神内部で休止していた。他のヘニュマンの神経考算機を解読しようとしたな？だが、無駄だ。アマルナトの記憶を封じたサイフェルを作ったのはあなただったのだから」
languages.original_text: "Shared knowledge lay dormant inside the mind of every Amarnat unit. You tried to decrypt the other Haneumanns' neurocogitators, did you not? But to no avail. It was you who created the cipher that locked Amarnat's memory."

traits.locale_text: 「共有した知識は各アマルナト・ユニットの精神内部で休止していた。他のヘニュマンの神経考算機を解読しようとしたな？だが、無駄だ。アマルナトの記憶を封じたサイフェルを作ったのはあなただったのだから」
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: “共享的知识蛰伏在每个阿玛纳特单位的头脑中。你曾试过破解其他哈努曼的神经认知器，对吧？而你一无所获。这是因为锁住阿玛纳特记忆的密码正是出自你之手。”
languages.original_text: "Shared knowledge lay dormant inside the mind of every Amarnat unit. You tried to decrypt the other Haneumanns' neurocogitators, did you not? But to no avail. It was you who created the cipher that locked Amarnat's memory."

traits.locale_text: “共享的知识蛰伏在每个阿玛纳特单位的头脑中。你曾试过破解其他哈努曼的神经认知器，对吧？而你一无所获。这是因为锁住阿玛纳特记忆的密码正是出自你之手。”
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: « La connaissance partagée des unités d'Amarnat sommeille en chacun d'entre nous. Vous avez tenté de déchiffrer les neurocogitateurs des autres Haneumann, n'est-ce pas ? Mais en vain. C'est vous-même qui avez créé le code verrouillant les souvenirs d'Amarnat. »
languages.original_text: "Shared knowledge lay dormant inside the mind of every Amarnat unit. You tried to decrypt the other Haneumanns' neurocogitators, did you not? But to no avail. It was you who created the cipher that locked Amarnat's memory."

traits.locale_text: « La connaissance partagée des unités d'Amarnat sommeille en chacun d'entre nous. Vous avez tenté de déchiffrer les neurocogitateurs des autres Haneumann, n'est-ce pas ? Mais en vain. C'est vous-même qui avez créé le code verrouillant les souvenirs d'Amarnat. »
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: «Todas las unidades del Amarnat compartían cierta información, pero esta estaba latente en su interior. Intentaste desencriptar los neurocogitadores de los otros Haneumann, ¿verdad? Pero no lo lograste. Y eso que fuiste tú quien creó el cifrado que bloqueó la memoria de Amarnat».
languages.original_text: "Shared knowledge lay dormant inside the mind of every Amarnat unit. You tried to decrypt the other Haneumanns' neurocogitators, did you not? But to no avail. It was you who created the cipher that locked Amarnat's memory."

traits.locale_text: «Todas las unidades del Amarnat compartían cierta información, pero esta estaba latente en su interior. Intentaste desencriptar los neurocogitadores de los otros Haneumann, ¿verdad? Pero no lo lograste. Y eso que fuiste tú quien creó el cifrado que bloqueó la memoria de Amarnat».
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: "Geteiltes Wissen schlummerte im Verstand jeder Amarnat-Einheit. Ihr habt versucht, die Neurocogitatoren der anderen Haneumanns zu entschlüsseln, nicht wahr? Doch vergebens. Ihr habt den Code erschaffen, der Amarnats Gedächtnis gesperrt hat."
languages.original_text: "Shared knowledge lay dormant inside the mind of every Amarnat unit. You tried to decrypt the other Haneumanns' neurocogitators, did you not? But to no avail. It was you who created the cipher that locked Amarnat's memory."

traits.locale_text: "Geteiltes Wissen schlummerte im Verstand jeder Amarnat-Einheit. Ihr habt versucht, die Neurocogitatoren der anderen Haneumanns zu entschlüsseln, nicht wahr? Doch vergebens. Ihr habt den Code erschaffen, der Amarnats Gedächtnis gesperrt hat."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: "Paylaşılan bilgi, her Amarnat biriminin zihninin içinde atıl durumdadır. Diğer Haneumannların nörokavramsayarlarını deşifre etmeyi denedin, değil mi? Fakat sonuç alamadın. Amarnat'ın hafızasını kilitleyen parolayı sen yaratmıştın."
languages.original_text: "Shared knowledge lay dormant inside the mind of every Amarnat unit. You tried to decrypt the other Haneumanns' neurocogitators, did you not? But to no avail. It was you who created the cipher that locked Amarnat's memory."

traits.locale_text: "Paylaşılan bilgi her Amarnat biriminin zihninin içinde atıl durumdadır. Diğer Haneumannların nörokavramsayarlarını deşifre etmeyi denedin, değil mi? Başarılı olamadın ama. Amarnat'ın hafızasını kilitleyen parolayı yaratan kişi sendin."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper
